ygData.subject: Re: black chestplates
ygData.msgSnippet: In response to your question the charred breastplate has a deep dull charcoal look to it. I have it, the boots, and the gloves. ( last nite I turned down
ygData.messageBody:
In response to your question the charred breastplate has a deep dull
charcoal look to it. I have it, the boots, and the gloves. ( last nite I
turned down rubicite gloves in fact to keep my charred. The 4 points better
of ac did NOT in my opinion offset the dex boost i got from charred!)

Elyana Silvanae
Bard of the 36th chourus
Ambassador to the Ridgerunners
Innoruuk Server


>i am wondering if anyone can answer a question for me. does the charred
>guardian breastplate look the same as an enamelled black chestplate?
>
>Shada D'ukal, Level 50 Bard, Mithaniel Marr
>Erisi Dlarit, Level 21 Paladin, Mithaniel Marr
